episodes.title: Luigi Corvaglia (FECRIS) at the OSCE meeting 2023
Luigi Corvaglia on cult apologists and geopolitics
episodes.description: Statement by Luigi Corvaglia (CeSAP, FECRIS, Open Minds Foundation) at the International Conference "Nation State and the New Transformational Forms of Religious Consciousness" organized by ICSE (International Center of Studies on Eurasia), Paris, February, 25  2021

episodes.title: Mothers in cults
episodes.description: Fecris 2016 (Sofia, Bulgaria). Luigi Corvaglia speaks on Mothers in Cults. Introduced by Dr. Janja Lalich.
